display_long_description:
Join the Mecha Discord server now! https://discord.gg/VuNyZQQZKH
"Mecha Force" is a VR mecha action game. Pilot the gigantic KYLIN in a chaotic future and face the Dominators, the ultimate threat to humanity. The fate of the world depends on your skills as a mecha pilot!
[media]
Experience intense, hardcore melee combat with an arsenal of mind-blowing skills!
[media]
Switch up your weapons and colors anytime to unleash your true power!
[media]
Battle epic alien mech bosses with everything you've got in a fight for survival!
[media]
Feel the thrill of powerful weapon combos and their explosive effects!

[media]
Interact with your cockpit and unleash your EPIC ULTIMATE SKILL for total domination!
